message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it. I'm looking for $20000 for it.

Thank you for offering the product. I understand your enthusiasm and appreciate your time. However, considering my budget and the current market value, I am willing to pay up to $17000 for the product.

I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was really hoping to get closer to my initial price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering it to you for $19000. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's a great deal for you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the product's features and my budget constraints, I believe we can reach an agreement at $18000.
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob, but I'm still hoping to get a bit more. I can do $18500, but that's as low as I can go. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to pay $18250 for the product. This is my final offer based on my budget and the value I perceive in the product.
